name: Coolor
description:
The goal of the game is simple, you need to work at a nuclear power plant, you need to bring liquid for cooling to the reactor, if you do not have time for 10 seconds the reactor explodes and you lose.

To understand where the liquid is on the top left, there is a text with the color of the room where the liquid is. Though the colour of the text will confuse you.

You can also collect orange squares with energy to restore stamina.

Liquid for cooling looks like blue Hexagon

You just simply need to put liquid inside reactor, just walk to it and it will automatically put it in there

Controls:

WASD- movement

Left shift- running
